title: Bonus 31: Retelling the Bible: A conversation with the Rev. W. Scott McAndless
itunes:title: Bonus: Retelling the Bible: A conversation with the Rev. W. Scott McAndless
description: In this bonus, I have a jaunty conversation with the Rev. W. Scott McAndless, author of the Retelling the Bible podcast. Scott has a ripping show for you, which I heartily recommend. We talk about how his show sprang from a book he wrote, and venture into various Biblical topics.
content:encoded: In this bonus, I have a jaunty conversation with the Rev. W. Scott McAndless, author of the Retelling the Bible podcast. Scott has a ripping show for you, which I heartily recommend. We talk about how his show sprang from a book he wrote, and venture into various Biblical topics.
itunes:subtitle: In this bonus, I have a conversation with the Rev. W. Scott McAndless, author of the Retelling the Bible podcast.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, W. Scott McAndless
